prompt: A majestic, snake-like creature made up of shimmering stardust and glowing nebula clouds, coiled around a distant planet. The Nebula Serpent's scales sparkle with the colors of the galaxies, and its eyes glow with an ancient, cosmic wisdom. The background features an ethereal space scene with star clusters, vibrant nebulas, and other celestial bodies. The art captures a mix of futuristic and mystical elements, creating a breathtaking vision of the cosmos.
